name: Immortal Game: The Greatest Chess Ever Played
name_original: Immortal Game: The Greatest Chess Ever Played
description:
What makes a chess game immortal? There are some games that are so stunning that people are still talking about them and studying them hundreds of years after they were played. Some games are stunning victories. Some are known for being losses. Others are well known even though neither player won! 

This book is a collection of ten of the most enduring chess accomplishments, games that scholars have attached the word immortal to. Games this noteworthy have acquired names of their own like, "Game of the Century," the "Peruvian Immortal," and the "Evergreen Game." As you study the games contained in the book you will be awed by their brilliance. This book isn't meant to be a deep analysis of positions or alternate moves (there are other sources for that), but rather an attempt to give insight and context to how and why these games have gained notoriety. 

Each game is replayed on an interactive board that allows you to advance the pieces and study the positions at your own pace. Purchase Immortal Game today and prepare to be astonished by the greatest chess ever played.
